languageServerExample.maxNumberOfProblem.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

languageServerExample.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.compile: tsc -p . && tsc -p tsconfig.client.json && tsc -p tsconfig.dockerfile-language-server-nodejs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.dockerfile-language-service.json && tsc -p tsconfig.dockerfile-utils.json
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../dockerfile-language-server-nodejs && npm install && cd ../dockerfile-language-service && npm install && cd ../dockerfile-utils && npm install && cd ..
